keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: Choose old potatoes of even size for this recipe. Use lean rump , fillet or sirloin steak for this recipe.

method.text:
Preheat oven to 200°C.
Scrub potatoes and place in oven for 1 hour 15 min, or until soft throughout.
After the potatoes have been cooking for 45 min, heat the oil and gently fry onions until golden brown and soft (this should take about 15 min).
Increase heat, add steak and fry for 3-4 min or until cooked.
Stir in mustard, wine and seasoning, and cook for 1 min.
When potatoes are cooked, cut them almost in half lengthways and spoon in the steak and onion filling.

title: Steak and onion in a jacket
